bibl.title: A Greek Christian Liturgical Hymn (P.CtYBR inv. 1584A).
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 1584. Edition of side A: a Greek Christian liturgical hymn dated to the 7th or 8th century (with quotations from Ps. 149:1 and 103:2). Brief description of side B: Coptic documentary text (two place names from the Fayyum are identifiable). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.13 P. Yale Inv. 1584B descr. 141.4 P. Yale Inv. 1584A
Alan Gampel & Céline Grassien, A Greek Christian Liturgical Hymn (P.CtYBR inv. 1584A).

P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 1584. Edition of side A: a Greek Christian liturgical hymn dated to the 7th or 8th century (with quotations from Ps. 149:1 and 103:2). Brief description of side B: Coptic documentary text (two place names from the Fayyum are identifiable). - Avec résumé en anglais.
